subject: Running
lead_paragraph: Scott Jurek, 41, overcame an injury, difficult terrain and sleep deprivation on the final stretch of the Appalachian Trail to complete the 2,189-mile run from Georgia to Maine in record time.
snippet: Scott Jurek, 41, overcame an injury, difficult terrain and sleep deprivation on the final stretch of the Appalachian Trail to complete the 2,189-mile run from Georgia to Maine in record time.
